abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL #194	INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN JOSEPH RODDY An ordinance recommended by the Board of Estimate and Apportionment authorizing the execution of a Third Amendment to redevelopment agreement between the City of St. Louis, Missouri, and St. Louis Innovation District, LLC; establishing the SSTIF account of the St. Louis Innovation District Special Allocation Fund; authorizing and directing the mayor and the comptroller to execute and deliver a second supplemental trust indenture, a financing agreement, a tax compliance agreement and a continuing disclosure agreement; superseding provisions of prior ordinances of the City to the extent inconsistent with the terms hereof; authorizing certain actions by city officials; and containing a severability clause.
